uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand

Class GameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.BaseActivity
        • uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.GameActivity

  • public class GameActivity
extends uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.BaseActivity
    The actual game activity where the player(s) play a game.

    Activity Flow

    The main flow of the activity is shown below: Author:
    bourgein

        public GameActivity()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Called when the activity is created. Calls setContentView to inflate the xml defined layout and setupGame(). Sets onClickListener for each grid square.

      • onCreateDialog

        public Dialog onCreateDialog(int id)
        Overrides the super method to show different dialogs for different scenarios
        Parameters:
        id - The type of dialog to show

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        Overrides super method to call showDialog(BACK_BUTTON_PRESS) when back button is pressed

      • setupGame

        public void setupGame()
        Setups the game. Works by calling getSettings(), initialising class fields, checking the parent Activity intent for whether the CPU is playing, setting player names and pictures. Also starts the countdown timer if a timed game is being played.

      • doMove

        public void doMove(int rowToPlay,
          int colToPlay)
        Makes a move by the current player if is a valid move. Called when player touches a valid square or the computer is due to (and can) play Calls endMove()
        Parameters:
        rowToPlay - the row to try and play
        colToPlay - the column to try and play

      • endMove

        public void endMove()
        Called after doMove() to setup the next go. If either player can go it swaps players over, changes colours, works out each player's valid and best moves, restart timer if timed game If neither player has a valid move the winner is found and endGame(winner) is called.

      • endGame

        public void endGame(uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.Player winner)
        Called when the game is over. Shows the end of game dialog If the winner has a highscore calls updateHighscore().
        Parameters:
        winner - the winning player

      • calcScore

        public void calcScore(uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.Player player)
        Calculates the score for the given Player object.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to calculate the current score for

      • flip

        public static void flip(int row,
        int col,
        int player,
        java.util.ArrayList<uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.Direction> dirs)
        Works out where what directions the player's pieces should be flipped in. The actual changing of the grid data structure is done by doFlip()
        Parameters:
        row - starting board row
        col - starting board column
        player - the current player
        dirs - the direction arraylist

      • doFlip

        public static void doFlip(uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.Direction dir,
          int row,
          int col,
          uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.Player player)
        Does the actual changing of the board grid data structure. Called by flip()
        Parameters:
        dir - the direction to flip in
        row - the starting row
        col - the starting column
        player - the current player

      • playSound

        public void playSound()
        Plays the 30 second warning sound

      • getLowestHighscore

        public int getLowestHighscore()
        Queries the highscore db to get the current lowest score as an int
        Returns:
        the current lowest score

      • openPhoto

        public java.io.InputStream openPhoto(java.lang.String photoUriString)
        Finds the InputStream for a contact photo based on the given string
        Parameters:
        photoUriString - represents a photo URI as a string
        Returns:
        Stream to the contact photo if found or null

      • setLayout

        public void setLayout(java.lang.String uriString,
             ImageView imgVw)
        Sets the player picture. Uses either the InputStream found using openPhoto() or the default 'stub' resource.
        Parameters:
        uriString - represents a photo URI as a string
        imgVw - the ImageView to set with the picture

      • getSettings

        public void getSettings()
        Gets the settings store in shared preferences. Stores them in the class fields as appropriate.

      • updateHighscore

        public void updateHighscore(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String uriString,
                   int score)
        updates highscore SQLite db with provided values
        Parameters:
        name - the player name
        uriString - the uri of the player image as a string
        score - the player score

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Handles presses on option menus items. Overrides the BaseActivity version to allow for different in-game behaviour.
        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class uk.ac.brookes.bourgein.reversiand.BaseActivity
